TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DesignerTransactionCloseEventArgs extends System.EventArgs

Docs.summary: Provides data for the and events.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost.TransactionClosed> event occurs when a designer finalizes a transaction.
## Examples The following code example demonstrates creating a DesignerTransactionCloseEventArgs.
[!code-vb[DesignerTransactionCloseEventArgsExample#1](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/t-system.componentmodel._144_1.vb)] [!code-cs[DesignerTransactionCloseEventArgsExample#1](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/t-system.componentmodel._144_1.cs)] [!code-cpp[DesignerTransactionCloseEventArgsExample#1](~/add/codesnippet/cpp/t-system.componentmodel._144_1.cpp)]
